item.title: OSAC OSM Web Development Project Demonstration 2023
item.description: Some glimpses from final day of Web Development Bootcamp where Mr. Hemanta Mahatara demonstrated his project. He walked us throught the django + leaflet web project he had built and explained the challenges, ways one can go abou making such project. We thank Mr. Hemanta Mahatara and everyone who participated in this session. Event Archive View youtube recording Event Gallery
